name: Chestnut Hunt
description:
Chestnut Hunt

You're on a hunt for chestnuts (and mushrooms)! Explore the forest beyond the riverside, and come back home before dark... or else!
...Or else you'll be lost in the dark!

Controls:
- WASD to move
- Space/RMB to interact
- LMB to charge chestnut throw
- ESC to quit
